event.title: was incorporated as a village in 1854

data.event: Meridian was incorporated as a village in 1854.
The Meridian Baptist Church, at the eastern edge of the village, was founded in 1810.

event.title: celebrated the 200th anniversary of its founding for a full year

data.event: The church celebrated the 200th anniversary of its founding for a full year in 2010.
The anniversary observance ended in October.

event.title: was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2005

data.event: The William Smith Ingham House was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2005.
